alert.note: Alert for Garland (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 5:30PM CDT until July 03 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Garland County in central Arkansas... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 530 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Piney in Garland County, or near Hot Springs, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hot Springs... Hot Springs Village... Mountain Pine... Hot Springs Memorial Field... Hot Springs National Park... Rockwell... Oaklawn Racetrack... Gulpha Gorge... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
